explanation: [0-1] In a snow-covered forest, there is a snowy slope surrounded by a wooden fence.

[1-10] Then a little girl, Masha, wearing a rose-red mid-length coat slides down the slope. She wears a rose-red hat with a gray pompom, gray gloves, and brown boots. Masha lies laughing on the snow as a brown bear hands her a yellow snow shovel. Masha looks at the bear curiously. Then the bear starts shoveling snow, and Masha does the same.

[10-20] Subsequently, Masha throws the shoveled snow backward with force, hitting the bear's back. The bear turns to look at Masha, who throws another shovelful of snow onto the bear's face. The bear shakes off the snow and stares at Masha. Masha laughs and continues to throw snow at the bear. The bear picks up the shovel and shields its face, the snow hitting the shovel.
